revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Distortion World |image = [[File:Distortion World.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Distortion World. |tokens = 82,500 |location = East of Route 214. }} '''Distortion World''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 922,100 |- | Dusclops (Boss) || 4,280,000 |- | Bronzong (Boss) || 4,280,000 |- | Giratina (altered) (Boss) || 8,880,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Golbat * Gastly * Haunter * Duskull * Chingling * Bronzor * Chimecho * Dusclops (boss) * Bronzong (boss) * Giratina (altered) (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 33% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 33% |- | {{Bag3|Token Collector}} [[Token Collector]] || 33% |}
